title: Trend Micro Control Manager AdHocQuery_SelectView XPATH Injection Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to disclose sensitive information on vulnerable installations of Trend Micro Control Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within AdHocQuery_SelectView.aspx. The issue lies in the failure to sanitize user-supplied input prior to executing an XML query. An attacker can use this information in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute code in the context of the process.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:http://esupport.trendmicro.com/solution/en-US/1114749.aspx
timeline:
2016-03-29 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2016-08-09 - Coordinated public release of advisory
